keyPolicies.policyDescription: Holding regular surgeries and keeping in touch with residents.
Campaigning to deliver the completion of the A555 by pass.
Campaigning for a final commemorative event at Woodford.
Fighting anti-social behaviour with more police on the beat.
Working for a better financial settlement for Stockport Borough.
Building on my local links to represents all areas of the community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Coaching youth rugby at Manchester Rugby Club
Working to improve commuter services at Cheadle Hulme Train Station
Supporting Bramhall High School as a Governor
Helping to bring a new police surgery to Cheadle Hulme, delivering a new noise monitor for Heald Green, recruiting new members for Stepping Hill Hospital

contactInformation.address: c/o Cheadle Conservatives, Moor Lane, Cheadle Hulme, SK8 5AT

leaflet.additionalNotes: For fresh, positive approach to politics - Vote for change on Thursday
